column2: VARDESC
Have you ever had any kind of sex
Have you ever had vaginal sex, also called sexual intercourse, with a woman? This means putting your penis in a woman’s vagina.
Have you ever performed oral sex on a woman? This means putting your mouth on a woman’s vagina or genitals.
Have you ever had anal sex with a woman? This means contact between your penis and a woman’s anus or butt.
How old were you the first time you had any kind of sex, including {vaginal, anal, or oral/vaginal or anal/vaginal or oral/anal or oral/vaginal/anal/oral}?
How old were you the first time you had any kind of sex, including {vaginal, anal, or oral/vaginal or anal/vaginal or oral/anal or oral/vaginal/anal/oral}?
In your lifetime, with how many women have you had any kind of sex?
In your lifetime, with how many women have you had any kind of sex?
In the past 12 months, with how many women have you had any kind of sex?
In the past 12 months, with how many women have you had any kind of sex?
In your lifetime, with how many women have you had vaginal sex? Vaginal sex means your penis in woman’s vagina.
In your lifetime, with how many women have you had vaginal sex? Vaginal sex means your penis in woman’s vagina.
In the past 12 months, with how many women have you had vaginal sex? Vaginal sex means your penis in a woman’s vagina.
In the past 12 months, with how many women have you had vaginal sex? Vaginal sex means your penis in a woman’s vagina.
In the past 12 months, about how often have you had [vaginal or anal/vaginal/anal] sex without using a condom?
column18: 2 = Less than half of the time
column20: 4 = Not always, but more than half of the time

column2: Have you ever had any kind of sex with a man, including oral or anal?
Have you ever performed oral sex on a man? Performing oral sex means your mouth on a man’s penis or genitals.
